statements: SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT class_id, student_id FROM student_attendance ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, class_id FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY student_id ASC, attendance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email, attendance_status FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY class_date ASC;
SELECT teacher_name, class_name FROM classes WHERE class_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY teacher_name, class_name;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, attendance_status FROM students WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 5);
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_date FROM classes WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, email, class_name, class_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.student_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_date FROM classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY student_id ASC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM students s JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id ORDER BY first_name ASC, class_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor FROM classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(attendance_id) AS attendance_count FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING attendance_count > 5;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.class_name, a.attendance_status FROM students s INNER JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id INNER JOIN classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE class_id IS NULL;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students JOIN engagement ON students.student_id = engagement.student_id WHERE engagement_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;

SELECT student_name, class_name, engagement_score FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN engagement ON students.student_id = engagement.student_id WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE class_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE class_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE email = 'teacher1@example.com';
SELECT class_name, class_time, teacher_name FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE class_id = 101;
SELECT class_name, class_time, teacher_name FROM classes WHERE class_time > '13:00';
SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN classes ON attendance.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM teachers WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
